snippet: If the president wants Congress’s support, he has to be more open.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Rep Alan Grayson contends if Pres Obama desires Congress's support for military intervention in Syria, he must provide far more evidence; bemoans fact that even lawmakers with security clearance, not to mention normal citizens, are prevented from analyzing basic and important information due to proliferation of classified status.
lead_paragraph: If the president wants Congress’s support, he has to be more open.

headline.main: On Syria Vote, Trust, but Verify
headline.print_headline: On Syria Vote, Trust, But Verify
